How many people are affected by cutis laxa ?,Cutis laxa is a rare disorder. About 200 affected families worldwide have been reported.,GHR,cutis laxa
What are the genetic changes related to cutis laxa ?,"Cutis laxa can be caused by mutations in the ATP6V0A2, ATP7A, EFEMP2, ELN, or FBLN5 gene. Most of these genes are involved in the formation and function of elastic fibers, which are slender bundles of proteins that provide strength and flexibility to connective tissue throughout the body.
